data.claim: Typography Trends 2026: 1) Uniformity is out, character is in. 2) Kinetic/motion typography for digital. 3) "Mutant Heritage" - classic fonts reimagined with off-kilter feel. 4) Human touch + strategic imperfection vs AI polish. 5) Funky curvy serifs trending. 6) Type as hero/graphic element (not quiet). 7) Variable fonts now standard. 8) Gothic/blackletter revival. 9) "Soft brutalism" - minimal but rough edges. 10) Joy and playfulness emphasized.
